column4: err, i had vista on one partition & ubuntu on another.  instead of uninstalling ubuntu like i should have, i just deleted the partition. now, when i try to boot, it gets stuck on 'loading grub, please wait..'  is there a way to get rid of grub or what? :<
Boot from Vsta DVD/CD and do a repair
If you are re-installing you can do Manual in partition...
